title: Did Michelle Obama commend Harvey Weinstein as "an amazing human being " in 2013?
subtitle: The former First Lady, Winston, thanked him for his role in the film of my students in the White House four years ago of publicly accusing dozens of women of rape, sexual abuse and sexual harassment.
